COMPONENT.MODULE:
1.The Chart of Accounts code are auto generated.
2.Dynamic Entry Types (Receipt, Payment, Contra, Journal Vouchers, etc).
3.Ledger account reconciliation.
4.Tag vouchers - tag based account statement generation.
5.Download Reports in CSV, PDF and HTML formats.
6.User authentication and roles.
7.User Action Logs.
8.Full support for MySQL database transactions to maintain data integrity.
9.Support for multiple accounts.
10.Auto generate account code as per selection of parent account.
11.Budget based payment control.
12.Configure of over-expenses in three way (fixed, percentage, not allowed).
13.Budget allocation and reallocation.
14.Upload institute logo and set name.
15.Generate monthly/quarterly/yearly reports ( Receipt, BS, IandE etc).
16.Change password of user.
17.login id is complete email id.
18.Edit of entry is not possible.
19.Setup Income projection.
20.Each entry verification by others.
21.Day Book and Cash Book generation.
22.Fund list with Report (Fund based accounting system).
23.Secondary Accounting Unit list and Reports.
24.TDS report
25.Unspent balance report for plan and non plan with summary report.
